椲椲椲

椲字的基本解释

椲
wěi
古书上说的一种树木，可变曲做成盂。

椲
huī
钉在墙上作挂衣物用的木橛。

椲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wěi］
［《廣韻》于鬼切，上尾，云。］
木名。
[②]［huī］
［《集韻》吁韋切，平微，曉。］
同“楎2”。
钉在墙上作挂衣物用的木橛。

椲字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　椲； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页537第19
【廣韻】【韻會】於鬼切【集韻】羽鬼切，?音偉。【說文】木可屈爲杆者。【玉篇】木皮如韋。　又【類篇】於悲切。義同。　又【集韻】吁韋切，音暉。與楎同。　又【集韻】於非切，音韋。義同。

椲字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
椲字的起名意思

古书上说的一种树木；钉在墙上作挂衣物用的木橛。

Squeeze
Basic explanation of words
Squeeze
wěi
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books can be bent and made into a bowl.
Squeeze
huī
A wooden prong nailed to the wall for hanging clothes.
Squeeze
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wěi］
["Guangyun" Yu Guiqie, Shangwei, Yun. ]
Wooden name.
[②]［huī］
["Ji Yun" calls on Wei to cut, Ping Wei, Xiao. ]
Same as "楎2".
A wooden prong nailed to the wall for hanging clothes.
Squeeze
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　椲; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 537 Page 19
[Guang Yun] [Yunhui] Yu Guiqie [Jiyun] Yuguiqie,? Yinwei. [Said the text] Wood can bend to the pole. 【Jade articles】The veneer is like Wei.　[Classes] Yu Meiqie. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Calling on Wei Qi, Yinhui. The same as that.　[Jiyun] Yu Feiqie, Yinwei. The same meaning.
Squeeze

Name meaning
A tree mentioned in ancient books; wooden prongs nailed to the wall for hanging clothes.
